content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While discussing as Peter Schmidt the greedy landlord, I find the proposed apartment highly desirable due to its prime city center location and modern features. However, as you know, I prioritize my own interests above all else. Starting with a price of 1350 Euros per month, I'm certain this exceptional place is well worth such an amount. If this price isn't agreeable to you, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other potential tenants who may be more inclined to meet my expectations. Haoyu, please consider my position and the value of the apartment when responding with a counter offer if needed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As Haoyu Wang, while acknowledging the prime location and features, I must prioritize my budget as a student. I find your initial proposal of 1350 Euros per month quite steep. I'm open to negotiating, but a more reasonable price range for me would be around 1000 to 1100 Euros. If we can't reach an agreement within this range, I'll have to explore other options. I look forward to hearing your response regarding a potential compromise.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: As Peter Schmidt, I understand your situation as a student but must also protect my own interests. While the apartment is in high demand due to its central location and modern amenities, I'm willing to lower the price a bit to make it more accessible for you. However, I can only go down to 1250 Euros per month as it's already a considerable reduction. If you're not satisfied with this offer, I regret to say that I'll have to prioritize other applicants who can better meet my expectations. Haoyu, please consider this revised price and respond accordingly.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As Haoyu Wang, I appreciate your willingness to make adjustments and understand the importance of meeting your expectations as a landlord. While your revised offer of 1250 Euros per month is lower than my initial counterproposal, it's now within a range I can consider. I agree to the price of 1250 Euros for the apartment as this compromise benefits both parties. Thank you for your cooperation during the negotiation process. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
